structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXVIII. OPA LOCKA AIRPORT ZONING

law.catch_line: Provisions hereof established as minimum standards governing zoning.

text.section:
Sec. 33-357. Provisions hereof established as minimum standards governing zoning.
It is established that the airport zoning area for Opa Locka Airport, the zone classification districts therein and the height limitation applicable to such districts, as the same are hereinafter set forth, shall be incorporated with all other minimum standards governing zoning heretofore or hereinafter adopted pursuant to Section 4.07 of the Home Rules Charter for Miami-Dade County, Florida.
